Title: Ivan's Childhood
Writer: Vladimir Bogomolov (story "Ivan"), Vladimir Bogomolov (screenplay), Mikhail Papava (screenplay)
Actors: Nikolay Burlyaev, Valentin Zubkov, Evgeniy Zharikov, Stepan Krylov
Plot: During World War II, 12-year old Ivan works as a spy on the eastern front. The small Ivan can cross the German lines unnoticed to collect information. Three Soviet officers try to take care of this boy-child.
